Change has been successfully merged
Change this to "pldm: Platform PDR support
done
can you mention how did you test this change?
Agree

- Added traces and check from which path the files has been taken for pdr generation.
- Removed power supply from default path and oem layer and identified that power supply pdr is not generating.
please correct it to - "platform"
done

ideally this is supposed to be the subsystem with in pldm , for easy reviews. like oem-ibm, host-bmc e.t.c

having just `PLDM` here does not add any value nor make things easy. Suggest to remove it.
done
rephrase as `this commit adds support to generate PDR's based in the platform`.
done
typo
no more required this code.
can we re-use the getPlatformName() from line number 136 here ?
implemented as part of new design changes.
please use your feedback on https://gerrit.openbmc.org/c/openbmc/pldm/+/67994 and fix the similar patterns here as well .
done.
isn't this statement redundant ? we are not using systemType.
implemented as part of new design changes.
this code is also present at https://github.com/openbmc/pldm/blob/33a9cd0b234b63e1f32859d2f5071684e4ed651d/oem/ibm/libpldmresponder/bios_oem_ibm.cpp#L14, please re-use.
implemented as part of new design changes.

there is already this infrastructure at https://github.com/openbmc/pldm/blob/33a9cd0b234b63e1f32859d2f5071684e4ed651d/oem/ibm/libpldmresponder/bios_oem_ibm.cpp#L65C48-L65C74, please re-use the same thing rather than creating a new match for exactly same data.
implemented as part of new design changes.
